## AABB.(constructor)

Construct an AABB by copying from another AABB.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(box: AABB);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  box | [AABB](doc/markdown/./base.aabb.md) | The AABB to be copied from. |
